仯字的基本解释

仯
chào
小孩子。

仯
miǎo
古同“眇”，少了一只眼。

仯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chào］
［《廣韻》初教切，去效，初。］
小。
[②]［chǎo］
［《集韻》楚絞切，上巧，初。］
通“1”。
固执，刚愎。
[③]［miǎo］
［《集韻》弭沼切，上小，明。］
通“眇1”。
眼瞎。

仯字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　仯； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页94第07
【廣韻】初敎切，超去聲。驚悚貌。　又【集韻】弭沼切，音藐。僬仯，小貌。

仯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
仯字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chào］
["Guangyun" teaches cutting at the beginning, to effect, at the beginning. ]
small.
[②]［chǎo］
["Ji Yun" Chu twisted and cut, Shang Qiao, early. ]
Pass "1".
Stubborn, stubborn.
[③] [miǎo]
["Ji Yun" Misuma cut, upper small, Ming. ]
Same as "眇1".
blindness.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　廯; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 94 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Cut at the beginning, super sound. Horrifying appearance.　[Jiyun] Misuma cut, sound 藐.僬仯, small appearance.
